translations.english: The emperor said: "Cao Shen is suitable."
Asked about the next, said: "Wang Ling is suitable, but a bit stubborn. Chen Ping can assist him.

translations.chinese: 王陵可，然少戇，陳平可以助之。
translations.english: Chen Ping has excess wisdom, but is difficult to employ alone.
Zhou Bo is solid and sincere but lacks refinement. However, the one who will secure the Liu clan must be Bo. Can make him grand marshal."
